channel.title: Server/Client Compatibility
channel.description:
Hey guys.
I have recently downloaded the Battlescape client and server. I am planning on doing some object and region placement work. I find that the Moparscape client is exceptional for this due to the coordinate convenience. For example, just by right-clicking an object it's coordinates are displayed, which is more convenient than noclipping and using a position command.
So I would like to use the Moparscape client with my Battlescape server source, however the Battlescape server only allows the Battlescape client to connect. I have looked for a long while now and canot find a way to allow Moparscape client connections. Does anybody know a method to do this?
All help is appreciated.
Thank you.
